audios.au: By means of the remote-control unit a freely choosable reference level can be defined. To raise the whole superstructure, the front and the rear axle are preselected.
As long as the RAISE button is pressed, the supporting bellows front and rear ar pressurized and the superstructure is raised.
The lighting of the ECAS warning lamp indicates, that the superstructure has left the current driving level.
As long as the LOWER button is pressed, all supporting bellows are vented and the superstructure is lowered.
The superstructure returns to driving level at a push on the driving level button.
The ECAS warning lamp goes out as soon as the driving level is achieved again.
